= Linux =

== AWK, set field separator ==
awk -F  ":" '/1/ {print $1}'

== CURL, send put command ==
(example taken from Elasticsearch's excluding a node)
`curl -X PUT -d '{"transient":{"cluster.routing.allocation.exclude._ip":"CLUSTER_HOST_IP"}}' http://localhost:9200/_cluster/settings&pretty=true `

== Change console language ==
sudo apt-get install language-pack-en language-pack-en-base manpages
sudo apt-get remove language-pack-de language-pack-de-base manpages-de
sudo vim /etc/default/locale
  LANG="en_GB.UTF-8"
sudo dpkg-reconfigure locales
  then add the en_GB WITHOUT removing de_DE

== Files, remove spaces from name ==
for f in *\ *; do mv "$f" "${f// /_}"; done
